local meta = {}

function meta:setImageSpriteInResource(image, resPath)
    CS.UIHelper.SetImageSpriteInResources(image, resPath)
end

function meta:newPanel(class_name, super)
    local origin_class = class(class_name, super)

    function origin_class:ctor(...)
        if self["OnInit"] then
            self:OnInit(...)
        end
    end
    origin_class["panel_name"] = class_name

    origin_class:new()
    return origin_class
end

return meta
